text: (nam'muṭaiya attāṭcikaḷai evarkaḷukku) muntiyavarkaḷum poyppittatait tavira (vēṟu etuvum ivarkaḷ kōrum) attāṭcikaḷai aṉuppa nam'mait taṭukkavillai (itaṟku muṉ) nām'samūtu' kūṭṭattārukku oru peṇ oṭṭakattaik kaṇkūṭāṉa attāṭciyākak koṭuttiruntōm; avarkaḷō (varampu mīṟi) ataṟku aniyāyam ceytaṉar; (makkaḷai) accamūṭṭi eccarippataṟkāvē aṉṟi nām (ittakaiya) attāṭcikaḷai aṉuppuvatillai
